Instruction: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cinnamon, and salt. Use a fork to cut in the butter until the mixture is crumbly. Add sugar and vanilla extract, mixing to form a stiff paste. Incorporate the egg, then knead the dough on a floured surface until smooth. Wrap it in foil or plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes, or until the edges are lightly golden. Allow to cool on wire racks.
